Object.Comment:
1st dungeon of the expedition. 5th dungeon overall.

Large, open floors without any real rooms. Has pokemon that tend to form herds or packs, so that when encounters are made, a good chance it’s a lot of pokemon moving together that’ll work together.
-Pokemon to add in the future if they get sprites: Blitzle, replace stantler probably
-purp kec shop stocks Low Tier TMs

Item.Comment: Large, open floors without real room definitions. Smaller than the 2nd half.
Large, open floors without real room definitions. Room is larger than the 1st half.
